[`Vault`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Vault.md) â€º [`cachedRead`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Vault/cachedRead.md)

## Vault.cachedRead() method

Read the content of a plaintext file stored inside the vault Use this if you only want to display the content to the user. If you want to modify the file content afterward use [Vault.read()](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/Vault/read.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
cachedRead(file: TFile): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  <code>file</code> | [`TFile`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/TFile.md) |  |

**Returns:**

`Promise``<string>`
